item.title: KENNAMETAL INC 10-K
item.description: KENNAMETAL INC, which is in the Machine Tools, Metal Cutting Types [3541] industry, SEC 10-K filing on August 10, 2021 had 28376 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: million - 368 instances 2021 - 323 instances june - 251 instances 30 - 242 instances 2020 - 239 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
